00039 #ifndef EXECUTABLE_INTERFACE_HPP
00040 #define EXECUTABLE_INTERFACE_HPP
00041 
00042 #include "../rtt-fwd.hpp"
00043 #include "../rtt-config.h"
00044 
00045 namespace RTT
00046 {
00047     namespace base {
00048 
00058         class RTT_API ExecutableInterface
00059         {
00060         protected:
00061             ExecutionEngine* engine;
00062         public:
00070             void loaded(ExecutionEngine* ee) { engine = ee; this->loading();}
00071 
00078             void unloaded() { this->unloading(); engine = 0;}
00079 
00080             ExecutableInterface() : engine(0) {}
00081             virtual ~ExecutableInterface() {}
00082 
00089             virtual void loading() {}
00090 
00095             bool isLoaded() { return engine != 0; }
00096 
00102             ExecutionEngine* getEngine() { return engine; }
00103 
00110             virtual bool execute() = 0;
00111 
00118             virtual void unloading() {}
00119         };
00120     }
00121 }
00122 #endif
